tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DiseaseOutbreaks (
    outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(255),
    outbreak_date DATE,
    affected_population INT,
    region VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE DiseaseOutbreaks (
  outbreak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(255),
  outbreak_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  confirmed_cases INT
);

CREATE TABLE PopulationHealth (
  health_record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  health_condition VARCHAR(255),
  record_date DATE,
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1)
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  treatment VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE population_health (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  population INT,
  demographic_info TEXT,
  health_status VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE outbreak_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(255),
    reported_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    reported_by VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE disease_statistics (
    statistics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(255),
    total_cases INT,
    total_deaths INT,
    update_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL
);
